mapper.sql: meta_data_id, origin_id, identity_id, file_name, file_path, file_type, industry, `size`, `rows`, `columns`, published_at, has_title, remarks, `status`, update_at, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select df.meta_data_id, df.file_name as metaDataName, df.file_type, df.size, df.published_at, df.status, df.update_at, ifnull(t.task_count,0) task_count from dc_meta_data df left join ( select tmd.meta_data_id, count(tmd.task_id) as task_count from dc_task_data_provider tmd group by tmd.meta_data_id ) t on df.meta_data_id = t.meta_data_id where df.identity_id = #{identityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and df.status = 2 order by df.published_at desc

select df.meta_data_id, df.file_name as metaDataName, df.identity_id, (select do.node_name from dc_org do where do.identity_id = df.identity_id) as nodeName, df.file_type, df.industry, df.size, df.rows, df.columns, df.published_at, df.remarks, df.status, df.update_at, ifnull(t.task_count,0) AS task_count from dc_meta_data df left join ( select tmd.meta_data_id, count(tmd.task_id) as task_count from dc_task_data_provider tmd group by tmd.meta_data_id ) t on df.meta_data_id = t.meta_data_id where df.meta_data_id = #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select df.meta_data_id, df.file_name as metaDataName, df.file_type, df.size, df.published_at, df.status, df.update_at, do.identity_id, do.node_name,
(select dmda.auth_status from dc_meta_data_auth dmda where dmda.meta_data_id = df.meta_data_id and dmda.user_id = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dmda.apply_at desc limit 1) as auth_status, (select dmda.audit_option from dc_meta_data_auth dmda where dmda.meta_data_id = df.meta_data_id and dmda.user_id = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dmda.apply_at desc limit 1) as audit_option,
0 as metaDataAuthStatus, -1 as metaDataAuthOption,
df.industry from dc_meta_data df join dc_org do on df.identity_id = do.identity_id
df.status = 2 and do.status = 1
and df.file_name like concat('%', #{dataName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by df.published_at

select df.meta_data_id, df.status, df.file_name as metaDataName, df.industry, df.published_at, df.update_at, df.file_type, df.size, df.columns, df.rows, df.remarks, dmda.auth_type, dmda.start_at, dmda.end_at, dmda.times, dmda.apply_at, do.identity_id, do.node_name from dc_meta_data_auth dmda join dc_meta_data df on dmda.meta_data_id = df.meta_data_id join dc_org do on df.identity_id = do.identity_id where dmda.meta_data_auth_id = #{metaDataAuthId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
